name: On-Screen Overload
description:
This game was made for the 2022 UNC Collegiate Game Jam which used the theme Big and Small.

This is a game based off of agar.io combined with a match-3 game. The idea is to increase your size by eating smaller objects and also increasing your score in the match-3 game in the smaller screen, hence using the theme Big and Small for the increasing size of the circles but also having to manage and big and small screen.

The goal is also to avoid the black circles because if you collide with them the game ends. 

Instructions: Move around with arrow keys and click on matches with mouse.

This game was is unfortunately not finished since it is missing a few things due to college and work:

-Enemy AI

-Increasing size when score increases

I will come back and complete this though even after the jam so if you like the game or think it has potential look out for a update in the future.
